p: Overall, the content of monoterpenes fluctuated from n.d. to 8.0% in the EO of wild hemp, 0.3 to 13% in the EO of the registered cultivars, and 0.2 to 10% of the EO of the breeding lines ( Supplementary Tables S1â€“S3). Monoterpene concentration in the EO of the USA hemp strain was 33 to 34% of the oil.
